task_description:
# Complete User Correction UI Workflow

Finish the user correction UI workflow to allow users to easily fix any detection errors before solving. Currently incomplete per project discovery.

## Rationale
Even with improved detection, some corrections will always be needed. A smooth correction workflow turns partial detection failures into successful solves, directly addressing user frustration.

## User Stories
- As a user, I want to quickly fix detection errors so that I don't have to start over from scratch
- As a puzzle enthusiast, I want to correct constraint numbers without retyping everything

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can edit detected grid dimensions
- [ ] Users can correct region assignments for any cell
- [ ] Users can fix constraint values with tap-to-edit
- [ ] Users can adjust domino pip values visually
- [ ] Changes are reflected in real-time preview
